name: Teen Mystery Club
description:
You and your friends are a crew of kid detectives in a world inspired by young-adult mystery novels and cartoons. Your mission is to know everything that’s going on in your small town and neighborhood, poke your nose where it doesn’t belong, and solve mysteries big and small. 

Inspired by Scooby-Doo, The Hardy Boys, Nancy Drew, and more.  

Teen Mystery Club is also inspired by Scavenge, Inc., which is a hack of  Lasers & Feelings

Cover design by Trevor Baum
